title: King of Prism: Shiny Seven Stars I - Prologue x Yukinojou x Taiga
original_name: KING OF PRISM -Shiny Seven Stars- I プロローグ x ユキノジョウ × タイガ
opening_song: "Shiny Seven Stars!" by Shin Ichijou (Junta Terashima), Yukinojou Tachibana (Souma Saitou), Taiga Kougami (Tasuku Hatanaka), Kakeru Juuouin (Taku Yashiro), Minato Takahashi (Masashi Igarashi), Leo Saionji (Takuma Nagatsuka), Yuu Suzuno (Yuuma Uchida)
ending_song: "366 LOVE Diary (366LOVE ダイアリー)" by Shin Ichijou (Junta Terashima), Yukinojou Tachibana (Souma Saitou), Taiga Kougami (Tasuku Hatanaka), Kakeru Juuouin (Taku Yashiro), Minato Takahashi (Masashi Igarashi), Leo Saionji (Takuma Nagatsuka), Yuu Suzun
sinopse: The first movie in the four-part King of Prism: Shiny Seven Stars movie series.
